text: Sano pati gachisoomedwaga kukwao ma Aya Getu gakupikanika, akasatiji: “Nganijuwa aju (Muhammadi ﷺ) ikaweje mundu jwaakusaka kunsiwilila ku yawaliji nkuigalagatila achatati wenu.” Ni akasatiji soni: “Nganijiwa aji (Qur’an) ikaweje unami waukusepedwa.” Ni akasawechetaga awala waakufuulu pakuigamba yakuona ndema jakwaichilila: “Nganiyiwa ayi ikaweje usawi wakuonechela.”
